How do I link to a book by ISBN?

To link to a book on http://isbn.nu using the book's ISBN, use the form [isbn://########]. (Remember to replace the #'s with the book's actual ISBN.)

For example: [isbn://0262011530|SICP] yields the link [isbn://0262011530|SICP].
